short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you earn cash back while you shop.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The SavingsKey extension is a free tool to help you remember to shop and earn cash back when you shop online with your favorite stores!

Simply install the SavingsKey extension  & it will then appear at the top of your browser window when you are shopping on participating eStore retailers like Apple, Best Buy, and hundreds more. Your purchases will earn cash back just as if you were shopping through the eStore.

The SavingsKey webapp shows you how much you can earn, featured merchant offers and allows you to add the store to your list of favorites

When the SavingsKey webapp pops up on a retailer site, simply click on 'Click here to earn...' and the toolbar will then change to display a green tick . You'll now collect cash back on whatever you spend!

If you click the Savings Key icon in your browser bar you can get more infomation about your Cash Rewards account and view FAQs about the toolbar


Read the  SavingsKey End User License agreement:
http://offers.incentivenetworks.com/webapp/eula.html

The  SavingsKey Toolbar is also available for other major browsers. Visit:
https://cashback.everywherecashsavings.com/client/

Developed by Incentive Networks. Visit us at www.incentivenetworks.com
